00009 #ifndef LGSS_KRB5_UTILS_H
00010 #define LGSS_KRB5_UTILS_H
00011 
00012 #ifndef _GNU_SOURCE
00013 #define _GNU_SOURCE
00014 #endif
00015 #include <string.h>
00016 #include <krb5.h>
00017 
00018 #include "lgss_utils.h"
00019 
00020 extern struct lgss_mech_type lgss_mech_krb5;
00021 
00022 /*
00023  * convenient macros, these perhaps need further cleanup
00024  */
00025 #ifdef HAVE_KRB5
00026 
00027 #define KEYTAB_ENTRY_MATCH(kte, name)                                           \
00028         (                                                                       \
00029          (kte).principal->data[0].length == (sizeof(name)-1) &&                 \
00030          strncmp((kte).principal->data[0].data, (name), sizeof(name)-1) == 0    \
00031         )
00032 
00033 #define KRB5_FREE_UNPARSED_NAME(ctx, name)                                      \
00034         krb5_free_unparsed_name((ctx), (name));
00035 
00036 #define KRB5_STRDUP(str)                                                        \
00037         strndup((str).data, (str).length)
00038 
00039 #define KRB5_STRCMP(str, name)                                                  \
00040         (                                                                       \
00041          (str)->length != strlen(name) ||                                       \
00042          strncmp((str)->data, (name), (str)->length) != 0                       \
00043         )
00044 
00045 #define KRB5_STRCASECMP(str, name)                                              \
00046         (                                                                       \
00047          (str)->length != strlen(name) ||                                       \
00048          strncasecmp((str)->data, (name), (str)->length) != 0                   \
00049         )
00050 
00051 static inline
00052 char *lgss_krb5_strdup(krb5_data *kstr)
00053 {
00054         return strndup(kstr->data, kstr->length);
00055 }
00056 
00057 static inline
00058 int lgss_krb5_strcmp(krb5_data *kstr, const char *str)
00059 {
00060         return (kstr->length != strlen(str) ||
00061                 memcmp(kstr->data, str, kstr->length) != 0);
00062 }
00063 
00064 static inline
00065 int lgss_krb5_strcasecmp(krb5_data *kstr, const char *str)
00066 {
00067         return (kstr->length != strlen(str) ||
00068                 strncasecmp(kstr->data, str, kstr->length) != 0);
00069 }
00070 
00071 #else /* !HAVE_KRB5 */
00072 
00073 #define KEYTAB_ENTRY_MATCH(kte, name)                                           \
00074         (                                                                       \
00075          strlen((kte).principal->name.name_string.val[0]) ==                    \
00076          (sizeof(name)-1) &&                                                    \
00077          strncmp(kte.principal->name.name_string.val[0], (name),                \
00078                  sizeof(name)-1) == 0                                           \
00079         )
00080 
00081 #define KRB5_FREE_UNPARSED_NAME(ctx, name)                                      \
00082         free(pname);
00083 
00084 #define KRB5_STRDUP(str)                                                        \
00085         strdup(str)
00086 
00087 #define KRB5_STRCMP(str, name)                                                  \
00088         strcmp((str), (name))
00089 
00090 #define KRB5_STRCASECMP(str, name)                                              \
00091         strcmp((str), (name))
00092 
00093 #endif /* HAVE_KRB5 */
00094 
00095 #endif /* LGSS_KRB5_UTILS_H */
